await myerrors.myAssert()
await myerrors.myRevert("0x15d34AAf54267DB7D7c367839AAf71A00a2C6A65", 3)
await myerrors.myRequire("0x15d34AAf54267DB7D7c367839AAf71A00a2C6A65", 0)

await myerrors.myAssert()
await myerrors.myRevert("0x15d34AAf54267DB7D7c367839AAf71A00a2C6A65", 1)
await myerrors.myRequire("0x15d34AAf54267DB7D7c367839AAf71A00a2C6A65",0)
await myerrors.myRequire("0x15d34AAf54267DB7D7c367839AAf71A00a2C6A65",2)

await myerrors.myRevert("0x15d34AAf54267DB7D7c367839AAf71A00a2C6A65", 1)

const myerrors = await (await ethers.getContractFactory("ErrorWorld")).attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
await myerrors.myRevert("0x9965507D1a55bcC2695C58ba16FB37d819B0A4dc" ,20)
await bank.getBalance("0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8")
await bank.getBalance("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266")
await bank.withdraw("0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8", 1)
await bank.getBalance("0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8")
await bank.getBalance("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266")
await bank.getBalance("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266"
await bank.transfer("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266", "0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8", 1)
await bank.getBalance("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266")
await bank.deposit("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266", 1)
const bank = await (await ethers.getContractFactory("Bank")).attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3")
